rules.name: Minimum Notice Period
rules.message: Termination notice period is below 30 days minimum
rules.remediation: Update termination clause to require at least 30 days notice

rules.name: Liability Cap Threshold
rules.message: Liability cap exceeds $2M threshold - requires executive approval
rules.remediation: Obtain executive sign-off or negotiate lower liability cap

rules.name: Auto-Renewal Review
rules.message: Auto-renewal clause with non-Delaware law - review recommended
rules.remediation: Legal review of auto-renewal terms under applicable state law
